div.l: Ey benedicite · than hadde I fowle spedde
And furth she goth · til she the cradil fond
She gropith alwey · further with hir hond
And fond the bedde · and thought nothyng but goode
Bi cause that the cradil · be it stoode
And nyst where she was · for it was derk
And faire and wele · she crept in to the clerk
And lith ful stille · and wold have caught a sleepe
Withyn a while this Iohn the clerk vp leepe
And on this goode wif he leyde on sore
So myrie a fitte · hadde she nat ful yore
He prikith hard and deepe · as she were mad
This Ioly lif han thiese two clerkis ladde
Til that the thridde kok · bigan to synge
Alayn wax wery · in the dawnyng
For he hadde swonken· al the long nyght
And saide farwel Malyn swete wight
The day Is come · I may no lengger abide
But eu͗ermore · wher so I go or Ride
I am thyn owne clerk · so have I sele
Now dere lemman quod she · go fare wele
But er ye go oo thyng · I wil yow telle
Whan that thow wendist · homward bi the Mille
Right at thentre · of the doore behynde
Thow shalt a cake · of half a busshel fynde
That was I maked · of thyn owne mele
Whiche that I halp · my sir for to stele
And goode lemman god the save and kepe
And with that word · almost she gan to wepe
Alaȳn vprisith · and thought or it dawe
